title Bomb n grouping
author Rosden Shadow [Mark Signorelli]
homepage rosden.itch.io

noaction
run_rules_on_level_Start

background_color #3B3942

text_color #F2F2AA

again_interval 0.05

#F2F2AA #E5C17E #CC7A52 #736053

22110
.2221


=======
LEGEND
=======

. = Background
# = Wall
P = Playerright

* = Crate
@ = crate2

% = wall1
$ = wall2
& = Crate3

O = Target
n = nomove
a = arrow2 and wall
e=end
t = end and target and eend
w=end and winend

1=hudblock1 and thefloor
2=hudblock2 and thefloor
c=cloner
-=thefloor
x=thefloorx
s= start and thefloor

feel=overwall or overcrate or overcrate2 or overwall1 or overwall2 or overcrate3
pushable=crate or cloner or swapcrate  or switcrate or switcrate2 or crate2


theemx= crate 
player=playerright or playerleft

blocker = wall or crate  or nomove or player or arrow or wall1 or wall2 or crate2 or crate3

arrowk = arrow or arrow2 or arrowx or arrowx2

fus=hudnone or start


win1=crate or Wall1 or hudblock1 
win2=crate2 or Wall2 or hudblock2
win3=crate3

smokeani=smokeani1 or smokeani2 or smokeani3 or smokeani4
thedead=cratedead or Crate2dead or Cratedead2 or Cratedead3 or Cratedead4 or Crate2dead2 or Crate2dead3 or Crate2dead4
thedead2=thedead or smokeani

win=win1 or win2 or thedead2 or crate3

deacti = hudblock2 or hudblock1
thesmoke= smokex or smoke or smokex2

mov= movr or movl or movu or movd
mov2= movr2 or movl2 or movu2 or movd2

conmov=mov or mov2
=======
SOUNDS
=======

pushable MOVE 36772507

crate3 MOVE 44332907

EndLevel 74089700

player MOVE 68988304
sfx0 52836103
sfx1 45427502

sfx2 29503700
sfx3 81951902

sfx4 60615706
sfx5 70040702

sfx6 36088902
================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================

Background
Target
nomove
start
spawn
acti,acti2
dying
die
nowin1
nowin2
pl
Player, Wall, pushable,swapwall,thefloor,thefloorx,wall1,wall2,crate3

col1dy
col2dy

movr
movl
movu
movd

movr2
movl2
movu2
movd2

thedead
smokeani
arrow, arrow2, arrowx, arrowx2
winend
eend
end, endx
hudblock1
hudblock2
hudnone

smokex
smokex2
smoke
feel


======
RULES
======

[feel]->[]
[thesmoke]->[]

[Cratedead4]->[]
[Cratedead3]->[Cratedead4]
[Cratedead2]->[Cratedead3]
[Cratedead no endx]->[Cratedead2]sfx5
[Cratedead ]->[Cratedead2]

[Crate2dead4]->[]
[Crate2dead3]->[Crate2dead4]
[Crate2dead2]->[Crate2dead3]
[Crate2dead]->[Crate2dead2]sfx5

[smokeani4]->[]
[smokeani3]->[smokeani4]
[smokeani2]->[smokeani3]
[smokeani1]->[smokeani2]

[> player|pushable]->[> player|> pushable > dying]
[> player|crate3]->[> player|> crate3]

[player]->[player pl]

[pushable movr]->[right pushable right dying ]
[pushable movl]->[left pushable left dying ]
[pushable movu]->[up pushable up dying ]
[pushable movd]->[down pushable down dying ]

[movr2]->[movr]
[movl2]->[movl]
[movu2]->[movu]
[movd2]->[movd]

right[right pushable|no blocker]->[right pushable| movr2]
left[left pushable|no blocker]->[left pushable| movl2]
up[up pushable|no blocker]->[up pushable| movu2]
down[down pushable|no blocker]->[down pushable| movd2]

[acti][pl ]->[acti][pl spawn]

late[pl target no acti]->[pl target acti] sfx4

[> crate|Target]->[> crate|target] sfx2

[ left Playerright] -> [ left playerleft]
[ right Playerleft] -> [ right playerright]

[endx] ->[thefloor] sfx2
[end | thefloor]-> [endx Cratedead |thefloor]


(BOMB N ICE)

[crate3 | pushable]->[smoke  col1dy col2dy smokeani1| pushable] sfx6

[smoke| ]->[smoke |smokex smokeani1]

[smokex|]->[smokex|smokex2 smokeani1]

[thesmoke wall]->[thesmoke]
[thesmoke wall1]->[thesmoke]

[thesmoke wall2]->[thesmoke]

[thesmoke crate]->[thesmoke]

[thesmoke crate2]->[thesmoke]

(BNI END)

late[col1dy][wall1]->[][wall1 dying]
late[col1dy][crate]->[][crate dying]

late[col2dy][wall2]->[][wall2 dying]
late[col2dy][crate2]->[][crate2 dying]

late[col1dy]->[]
late[col2dy]->[]

(late[pl]->[pl dying])

(
late [acti][Crate]->[acti][Wall1]
late [acti][Crate2]->[acti][Wall2]
)


late [acti][spawn no blocker] [hudblock1|fus]->[acti][wall1 dying][hudnone|fus]
late [acti][spawn no blocker] [hudblock2|fus]->[acti][wall2 dying][hudnone|fus]

(late [ win1|pl dying]->[win1 dying|pl dying]
late [ win2|pl dying]->[win2 dying|pl dying])
late [ win1|win1 dying]->[win1 dying|win1 dying]
late [ win2|win2 dying]->[win2 dying|win2 dying]

late[win1 no dying]->[win1 nowin1]
late[win2 no dying]->[win2 nowin2]
late[win1]->[win1 die]
late[win2]->[win2 die]
late[nowin1][win1 die]->[nowin1][win1]
late[nowin2][win2 die]->[nowin2][win2]
late[win1 die]->[Cratedead]
late[win2 die]->[Crate2dead]


late up [wall| ]-> [wall|overwall]
late up [wall1| ]-> [wall1|overwall1]
late up [wall2| ]-> [wall2|overwall2]
late up [theemx| ]-> [theemx|overcrate]

late up [crate2| ]-> [crate2|overcrate2]
late up [crate3| ]-> [crate3|overcrate3]

late up [end| ]-> [end|overcrate]
late up [endx| ]-> [endx|overcrate]

late[dying]->[]
late[die]->[]
late[nowin1]->[]
late[nowin2]->[]
late[pl]->[]

late[deacti][acti]->[deacti][acti2]
late[acti]->[]
late[acti2]->[acti]

([action player eend|]->[action player eend |crate Target])

[]-> again 
(
[arrow]->[arrowx2]
[arrow2]->[arrowx]

[arrowx]->[arrow]
[arrowx2]->[arrow2])
==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============

no win
no winend
=======
LEVELS
=======

message This is a game based on 2 other games. 'BOMB N ICE' and 'GROUPING'. I recommend you play both those first before playing this game.
message remove all cubes

message level 1 of 8
